channel.title: Filesystems on Velociraptor - Digging deeper!
channel.description: Recent content in Filesystems on Velociraptor - Digging deeper!

item.title: Digging for files with Velociraptor
item.description: One of the most common questions in digital forensics is: Is a file with a specific filename currently present on this system or was it in the past? There are many scenarios that lead to this question, from theft of IP by rogue employees, to drive by downloads from malicious websites or even victims of phishing emails. Often we need to scope this question to the entire network (Which machines had this file?
